monumenta:quests/r1/abeastofabook.title: A Beast of a Book
monumenta:quests/r1/abeastofabook.description: You learned from an expert hunter and earned your own Bestiary.

monumenta:quests/r1/acrewtoremember.title: A Crew to Remember
monumenta:quests/r1/acrewtoremember.description: Captain Indigo now has a motley crew of eccentric pirates, ready to sail thanks to your help.

monumenta:quests/r1/acrownofmadness.title: A Crown of Madness
monumenta:quests/r1/acrownofmadness.description: Aimee has been cured and the King has been saved from the plot of a sneaky Son of the Forest.

monumenta:quests/r1/acrownofmajesty.title: A Crown of Majesty
monumenta:quests/r1/acrownofmajesty.description: After assisting a jeweler named Aimee, she now has everything she needs to make a crown for King Petrus II.

monumenta:quests/r1/alittlespark.title: A Little Spark
monumenta:quests/r1/alittlespark.description: You helped Cinevra out by getting her an arc-crystal.

monumenta:quests/r1/allthatremains.title: All That Remains
monumenta:quests/r1/allthatremains.description: You managed to discover the fate of Aphelios and destroy one of the Andromeda shards, but the Ones From Above are still watching...

monumenta:quests/r1/apigculiarproblem.title: A Pigculiar Problem
monumenta:quests/r1/apigculiarproblem.description: You've learned the secrets of how pigs can speak and helped Walter Jr. live his dream.

monumenta:quests/r1/astudyincrimsonone.title: A Study in Crimson Part One
monumenta:quests/r1/astudyincrimsonone.description: The Crimson King called in your contract. You worked with him to dig through memories, searching for a way to restore the Crimson Wool.

monumenta:quests/r1/astudyincrimsontwo.title: A Study in Crimson Part Two
monumenta:quests/r1/astudyincrimsontwo.description: Working again with the Crimson King, you searched past and present for the lost Silver Knight. You found it, dead, below the Monument, leaving the future uncertain.

monumenta:quests/r1/avaultofglass.title: A Vault of Glass
monumenta:quests/r1/avaultofglass.description: Commanded by the Order of Glass to uncover Octavius's misdeeds, you failed when the evidence was taken by Duchess Emmeline.

monumenta:quests/r1/bandittroubles.title: Bandit Troubles
monumenta:quests/r1/bandittroubles.description: Raiding two bandit camps, you learned the truth of Octavius's shady business dealings.

monumenta:quests/r1/baneofthebakers.title: Bane of the Bakers
monumenta:quests/r1/baneofthebakers.description: Stefan needed a pretzel recipe, and you stole it for him in exchange for some strange rewards.

monumenta:quests/r1/buriedblade.title: Buried Blade
monumenta:quests/r1/buriedblade.description: A landslide ruined Blackjack Stan's smuggling den. Of course, he sent you into a deadly cave to retrieve a sword he needed.

monumenta:quests/r1/burningbright.title: Burning Bright
monumenta:quests/r1/burningbright.description: Because of your actions, Oceangate Lighthouse burns brighter than ever before.

monumenta:quests/r1/castingforhelp.title: Casting for Help
monumenta:quests/r1/castingforhelp.description: Working with Nurse Deidre, you made a cast for Melinda and repaired more than just a bone.

monumenta:quests/r1/clearasglass.title: Clear As Glass
monumenta:quests/r1/clearasglass.description: After defeating Virius, Nelfine's memory has truly returned and with it her friendship with Arian.

monumenta:quests/r1/cluckedup.title: Clucked Up
monumenta:quests/r1/cluckedup.description: You went on a clucking silly adventure, and defeated the god of pigs.

monumenta:quests/r1/crazycupidlove.title: Crazy, Cupid, Love
monumenta:quests/r1/crazycupidlove.description: You solved mysterious puzzles leading to Psychie's lost love, Cupid.

monumenta:quests/r1/creeperjuice.title: Creeperjuice
monumenta:quests/r1/creeperjuice.description: In trying to help Creeper Fanatic Boris spread delight to Creeperkind, you instead battled a horrifying demonic creeper from beyond.

monumenta:quests/r1/dishtodiefor.title: A Dish To Die For
monumenta:quests/r1/dishtodiefor.description: You helped Claude make his culinary masterpiece. After fighting him, his appetite for human flesh should be gone.

monumenta:quests/r1/finishedbusiness.title: Finished Business
monumenta:quests/r1/finishedbusiness.description: You helped a weird little man be slightly less weird and stop writing fanfiction about you.

monumenta:quests/r1/flashinthepan.title: Flash in the Pan
monumenta:quests/r1/flashinthepan.description: You've completed a race around Sierhaven. Search towns around the world for more races.

monumenta:quests/r1/fountainofmiracles.title: Fountain of Miracles
monumenta:quests/r1/fountainofmiracles.description: You've purified the waters of the Fountain of Miracles, corrupted by dark magic from deep in the jungle.

monumenta:quests/r1/glooperduper.title: Glooper Duper
monumenta:quests/r1/glooperduper.description: You helped a strange man in the Swamp find dinner.

monumenta:quests/r1/halidssong.title: Halid's Song
monumenta:quests/r1/halidssong.description: You helped an old Tlaxan regain his musical talent, and got music of your own in return...

monumenta:quests/r1/heroreturn.title: A Hero's Return
monumenta:quests/r1/heroreturn.description: Choose your class proper and carry on with your adventure!

monumenta:quests/r1/intothinair.title: Into Thin Air
monumenta:quests/r1/intothinair.description: Following in the footsteps of Aurora, you discovered the truth behind her disappearance...

monumenta:quests/r1/lightsbeyond.title: Lights Beyond
monumenta:quests/r1/lightsbeyond.description: The lights have shown you the way in the darkness, where you found a strange letter...

monumenta:quests/r1/lostinmymind.title: Lost in My Mind
monumenta:quests/r1/lostinmymind.description: A secret warehouse lies beneath Sierhaven, filled with missing people. Eowen has closure, but mysteries still remain.

monumenta:quests/r1/mageslegacy.title: Mage's Legacy
monumenta:quests/r1/mageslegacy.description: Helping Archmage Vargos, you translated an ancient Tlaxan poem and learned the tragic history of the mage council.

monumenta:quests/r1/memoriesofbattle.title: Memories of Battle
monumenta:quests/r1/memoriesofbattle.description: You investigated the secrets of the Arena, instead discovering the Crimson King was involved the whole time.

monumenta:quests/r1/missingpet.title: Runaway Pet
monumenta:quests/r1/missingpet.description: You reunited Leonard and his adorable pet Mr. Snuggles.

monumenta:quests/r1/missingsoldiers.title: Missing Soldiers
monumenta:quests/r1/missingsoldiers.description: Sergeant Sigrun needed your help finding her soldiers. Unfortunately, the Jaguar Tribes found them first.

monumenta:quests/r1/nelfinescurse.title: Nelfine's Curse
monumenta:quests/r1/nelfinescurse.description: You helped restore Nelfine's memory. Hopefully she'll remember more and more with time...

monumenta:quests/r1/ofmonksandmagic.title: Of Monks and Magic
monumenta:quests/r1/ofmonksandmagic.description: You saved the Axtan Monks from the Sons of the Forest, a shadowy cabal of druids.

monumenta:quests/r1/outerdemons.title: Outer Demons
monumenta:quests/r1/outerdemons.description: What seemed like a mission to find a lost book turned into a search through the mysterious Grove, where you encountered the demon summoner Azacor.

monumenta:quests/r1/pyromania.title: Pyromania
monumenta:quests/r1/pyromania.description: Braving several lava-filled caverns, you brought Carbocius magma samples from around the valley.

monumenta:quests/r1/root.title: King's Valley Quests
monumenta:quests/r1/root.description: Welcome to Monumenta, the CTM MMO RPG!

monumenta:quests/r1/siegeofhighwatch.title: Siege of Highwatch
monumenta:quests/r1/siegeofhighwatch.description: Highwatch is saved from a swarm of ghasts and blazes, and you've uncovered the true plans of the Sons of the Forest.

monumenta:quests/r1/sierhaven.title: Sierhaven
monumenta:quests/r1/sierhaven.description: Discover the City of Sierhaven, capital of King's Valley

monumenta:quests/r1/snowmanleftbehind.title: Snow Man Left Behind
monumenta:quests/r1/snowmanleftbehind.description: The hunt for the Snow Wool led you to its destruction, and you battled its spirit to save the holidays!

monumenta:quests/r1/sonsoftheforest.title: Sons of the Forest
monumenta:quests/r1/sonsoftheforest.description: You stole a powerful binding spell from the Sons of the Forest, hindering their plans! No doubt they are planning their revenge...

monumenta:quests/r1/starriernight.title: Starrier Night
monumenta:quests/r1/starriernight.description: You repaired another spyglass, this time for Mayleen's friend Montana. While secretive, it seems there's more here than just stargazing...

monumenta:quests/r1/starriestnight.title: Starriest Night
monumenta:quests/r1/starriestnight.description: You repaired the telescope, but something more sinister is yet to unfold...

monumenta:quests/r1/starrynight.title: Starry Night
monumenta:quests/r1/starrynight.description: By breaking into an armory and spinning gears, you helped Mayleen fix her telescope.

monumenta:quests/r1/supplyanddemand.title: Supply and Demand
monumenta:quests/r1/supplyanddemand.description: After running around Sierhaven, you helped deliver a package of supplies to Melinda in the eastern district.

monumenta:quests/r1/thecrystalconnection.title: The Crystal Connection
monumenta:quests/r1/thecrystalconnection.description: Overcoming another trip into Velara and an attack by the Sons of the Forest, you connected Ta'Eldim and Sierhaven.

monumenta:quests/r1/theeldersscrolls.title: The Elder's Scrolls
monumenta:quests/r1/theeldersscrolls.description: When T'Xoc asked for your help to locate a missing Tlaxan Elder, you followed their trail back to the Verdant Fortress... What lurks inside?

monumenta:quests/r1/theplague.title: The Plague
monumenta:quests/r1/theplague.description: Nyr was at risk of falling to a deadly plague, but you and C'Taz created an ancient medicine to save the town.

monumenta:quests/r1/thesalmon.title: The Salmon
monumenta:quests/r1/thesalmon.description: You caught a royal fish (with strange defenders) and won a fishing contest. Display the trophy proudly.

monumenta:quests/r1/thescoutscodex.title: The Scout's Codex
monumenta:quests/r1/thescoutscodex.description: You helped Laura find her diary. With the information stored in the book, the northern path to Sierhaven may be a lot safer now!

monumenta:quests/r1/timetoreflect.title: Time to Reflect
monumenta:quests/r1/timetoreflect.description: By solving the mirror puzzles in Ta'Eldim's shrine, you gained the trust of Barras, the Shrinetender.

monumenta:quests/r1/tlaxantroubles.title: Tlaxan Troubles
monumenta:quests/r1/tlaxantroubles.description: T'Lm told you of his people's hidden town, Ta'Eldim. While you have gained entry, not all the townspeople trust you yet...

monumenta:quests/r1/truegenius.title: True Genius
monumenta:quests/r1/truegenius.description: You have earned the title of Dreamwalker by interacting with the dreamers.

monumenta:quests/r1/truergenius.title: Truer Genius
monumenta:quests/r1/truergenius.description: You have continued your journey of Dreamwalker, into realms never before walked.

monumenta:quests/r1/unveiled.title: Unveiled
monumenta:quests/r1/unveiled.description: The Masked Man, an agent of Calder, has been stopped and the Black Shard reclaimed from the Sons of the Forest. They will no longer threaten the valley with their dark magic.

monumenta:quests/r1/wuhl.title: Words Upon Hushed Lips
monumenta:quests/r1/wuhl.description: Dimitri's mentor, Ignos, has vanished, but you found closure and a clue in his cryptic journal.

monumenta:quests/r2/aimingforsuccess.title: Aiming For Success
monumenta:quests/r2/aimingforsuccess.description: You passed the Frostgate Target Test and learned the Ranger Specialization. Found in the Chillwind Overworld.

monumenta:quests/r2/alichinthesystem.title: A Lich in the System
monumenta:quests/r2/alichinthesystem.description: With the help of some researchers, you fought against the former Vizier of Al Malakut, Hekawt, now a lich, and prevented him from causing further destruction.

monumenta:quests/r2/alostcause.title: A Lost Cause
monumenta:quests/r2/alostcause.description: The Ishnir Trade may have suffered a catastrophic loss, but with your help they should be able to recover.

monumenta:quests/r2/alricslegacy.title: Alric's Legacy
monumenta:quests/r2/alricslegacy.description: You learned from the Giant slayer himself and fought a Giant yourself, preventing total destruction of the Isles.

monumenta:quests/r2/amerchantswoe.title: A Merchant's Woe
monumenta:quests/r2/amerchantswoe.description: You've helped Riaz recover his lost supplies.

monumenta:quests/r2/analcoholicaccord.title: An Alcoholic Accord
monumenta:quests/r2/analcoholicaccord.description: You helped Levyn with a deal to get information, but ended up getting tricked in the process.

monumenta:quests/r2/anotherworldlyhunt.title: An Otherworldly Hunt
monumenta:quests/r2/anotherworldlyhunt.description: You gather the pelts of rare creatures and learned the Hunter Specialization. Found in the Ishnir Overworld.

monumenta:quests/r2/anunexpectedlesson.title: An Unexpected Lesson
monumenta:quests/r2/anunexpectedlesson.description: The Duchess called upon you once again, and an unnerving secret was uncovered about Salieri's past.

monumenta:quests/r2/anunlikelypartnershi.title: An Unlikely Partnership
monumenta:quests/r2/anunlikelypartnershi.description: The Duchess used you to spy on diplomats. Will it be you that puts an end to her reign of terror?

monumenta:quests/r2/ashamanslament.title: A Shaman's Lament
monumenta:quests/r2/ashamanslament.description: You helped C'Rondis perform a ritual and unlocked the Soothsayer specialization. Found in Mistport.

monumenta:quests/r2/asimplefavor.title: A Simple Favor
monumenta:quests/r2/asimplefavor.description: You assisted in retrieving a hitlist from pirates and learned the Assassin Specialization. Found in Mistport.

monumenta:quests/r2/astrokeofgenius.title: A Stroke of Genius
monumenta:quests/r2/astrokeofgenius.description: You helped Atiuh break a Hex below Viridia and unlocked the Hexbreaker specialization. Found in the Viridian Isles Overworld.

monumenta:quests/r2/asunkenfeeling.title: A Sunken Feeling
monumenta:quests/r2/asunkenfeeling.description: You helped save Mistport's massive underground farm.

monumenta:quests/r2/atoweringobjective.title: A Towering Objective
monumenta:quests/r2/atoweringobjective.description: You assisted in disrupting a tower's magic and learned the Berserker Specialization. Found in the Ishnir Overworld.

monumenta:quests/r2/bleedingproof.title: Bleeding Proof
monumenta:quests/r2/bleedingproof.description: You sought out a survivor of the Congress, but things didn't quite go as expected.

monumenta:quests/r2/bloodybanquet.title: Bloody Banquet
monumenta:quests/r2/bloodybanquet.description: You investigated a brutal murder of a rich Countess! You caught the murderer! He's behind bars... for now.

monumenta:quests/r2/borrowedtime.title: Borrowed Time
monumenta:quests/r2/borrowedtime.description: After much debate with your allies, you brought the Crimson King to the Isles and survived a clash with the Teal Spirit. However, there is still more to do...

monumenta:quests/r2/bringhimbaack.title: Bring Him Baack
monumenta:quests/r2/bringhimbaack.description: You followed a mysterious and baffling trail that may have brought back a friend...

monumenta:quests/r2/dealbreaker.title: Dealbreaker
monumenta:quests/r2/dealbreaker.description: Safar was pleased with your work, The Ishnir Trade knows of your name now...

monumenta:quests/r2/deathsswiftness.title: Death's Swiftness
monumenta:quests/r2/deathsswiftness.description: You fought illusions of the past and learned the Harbinger Specialization. Found in the Ishnir Overworld.

monumenta:quests/r2/depthscharge.title: Depths Charge
monumenta:quests/r2/depthscharge.description: Following the path of a Lieutenant of the Black Mist, you discovered a Breach below the ocean where something evil approaches.

monumenta:quests/r2/deservedrest.title: A Well Deserved Rest
monumenta:quests/r2/deservedrest.description: You may have destroyed the castle's floor and table, but the Marshall can get some rest.

monumenta:quests/r2/fableddestiny.title: Fabled Destiny
monumenta:quests/r2/fableddestiny.description: You've helped Herriot realise a new destiny which is awaiting for him.

monumenta:quests/r2/fishybusiness.title: Fishy Business
monumenta:quests/r2/fishybusiness.description: Whether you like it or not, Lincoln's pesky client has been dealt with.

monumenta:quests/r2/flockandkey.title: Flock and Key
monumenta:quests/r2/flockandkey.description: Your first initial heist as a Night Rooster.

monumenta:quests/r2/guardingtheguarded.title: Guarding the Guarded
monumenta:quests/r2/guardingtheguarded.description: You helped Galablad protect Grethony and learned the Guardian Specialization. Found in the Chillwind Overworld.

monumenta:quests/r2/guildingblocks.title: Guilding Blocks
monumenta:quests/r2/guildingblocks.description: The truth of the Ishnir Trade Guild has come to light, and you helped them forge a path to a better future.

monumenta:quests/r2/healthfulnetworking.title: Healthful Networking
monumenta:quests/r2/healthfulnetworking.description: You helped Ellen establish a communication network and learned the Hierophant Specialization. Found in the Chillwind Overworld.

monumenta:quests/r2/heretherebedragons.title: Here There Be Dragons
monumenta:quests/r2/heretherebedragons.description: Working with Izzy, Levyn, and clearly Not Samwell, you went on a piratey adventure and discovered something below the City of Bones.

monumenta:quests/r2/kingdomoflies.title: Kingdom Of Lies
monumenta:quests/r2/kingdomoflies.description: You rooted out the Masked in Ishnir's government after getting unexpectedly arrested.

monumenta:quests/r2/lifeisoftheessence.title: Life Is Of The Essence
monumenta:quests/r2/lifeisoftheessence.description: You helped Bero continue his experiments and learned the Reaper Specialization. Found in the Viridian Overworld.

monumenta:quests/r2/longwaydown.title: Long Way Down
monumenta:quests/r2/longwaydown.description: You've assisted Myra in conquering her fear.

monumenta:quests/r2/lostinthedark.title: Lost in the Dark
monumenta:quests/r2/lostinthedark.description: You found your way through a very dark maze and learned the Tenebrist Specialization. Found in Alnera.

monumenta:quests/r2/masterofall.title: Master of All
monumenta:quests/r2/masterofall.description: Complete all Specialization Trials in the Celsian Isles.

monumenta:quests/r2/masterofone.title: Master of One
monumenta:quests/r2/masterofone.description: You helped out the Teacher in Mistport to reopen the Specialization School.

monumenta:quests/r2/oldermagic.title: Older Magic
monumenta:quests/r2/oldermagic.description: You helped create a barrier spell and learned the Arcanist Specialization. Found in Rahkeri.

monumenta:quests/r2/outwithabang.title: Out With A Bang
monumenta:quests/r2/outwithabang.description: Ebonee and her friends are now known among their peers for legendary pranks.

monumenta:quests/r2/overdoomed.title: Overdoomed
monumenta:quests/r2/overdoomed.description: Retrieved by any means necessary, the book is now back in Saanavi's hands.

monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations013.title: Primeval Creations: 013-2 Wools
monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations013.description: You delved further into Selari's workshop and learned more about the nature of the Teal Wool, and Selari's future plans.

monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations1.title: Primeval Creations I
monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations1.description: You discovered the workshop of a mysterious man named Selari and learned more about the nature of the White Wool.

monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations2.title: Primeval Creations II
monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations2.description: You delved further into Selari's workshop and learned more about the nature of the Orange and Magenta Wools.

monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations3.title: Primeval Creations III
monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations3.description: You delved further into Selari's workshop and learned more about the nature of the Light Blue and Yellow Wools.

monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations39.title: Primeval Creations III.9
monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations39.description: You delved further into Selari's workshop and learned more about the nature of the Crimson Wool and Selari himself.

monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations4.title: Primeval Creations IV
monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations4.description: You delved further into Selari's workshop and learned more about the nature of the Lime and Pink Wools.

monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations5.title: Primeval Creations V
monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations5.description: You delved further into Selari's workshop and learned more about the nature of the Gray and Light Gray Wools.

monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations6.title: Primeval Creations VI
monumenta:quests/r2/primevalcreations6.description: You delved further into Selari's workshop and learned more about the nature of the Cyan and Purple Wools.

monumenta:quests/r2/purtrefactionandpuri.title: Purtrefaction and Purification
monumenta:quests/r2/purtrefactionandpuri.description: You slayed a Wither and learned the Paladin Specialization. Found in Nightroost.

monumenta:quests/r2/pyreandprejudice.title: Pyre and Prejudice
monumenta:quests/r2/pyreandprejudice.description: You've assisted Nitreia in fixing Steelmeld's agricultural problems.

monumenta:quests/r2/raidingparty.title: Raiding Party
monumenta:quests/r2/raidingparty.description: You assisted Captain Lamis and ended up getting attacked by a strange assailant.

monumenta:quests/r2/risforreprisal.title: R Is For Reprisal
monumenta:quests/r2/risforreprisal.description: You rooted out the Masked in the Chillwind's government while trying to protect Wispervale from Mage Hunters.

monumenta:quests/r2/sabotage.title: Sabotage
monumenta:quests/r2/sabotage.description: The Fist of Turaal is operational once again now that you have helped Lt. Aulber.

monumenta:quests/r2/scientistsofsteelmel.title: Scientists of Steelmeld I
monumenta:quests/r2/scientistsofsteelmel.description: You have completed the Professor's challenges... for now.

monumenta:quests/r2/scientistsofsteelmel.title: Scientists of Steelmeld II
monumenta:quests/r2/scientistsofsteelmel.description: You have completed even more of the Professor's challenges... for science!

monumenta:quests/r2/silverskinned.title: Silver Skinned
monumenta:quests/r2/silverskinned.description: Joining back up with Fred, you uncovered lingering questions about the Shifting City and its origin.

monumenta:quests/r2/stablemastersrequest.title: Stablemaster's Request
monumenta:quests/r2/stablemastersrequest.description: Now Miane's stable is full of life once more!

monumenta:quests/r2/tenthousandbets.title: Ten Thousand Bets
monumenta:quests/r2/tenthousandbets.description: You retrieved Myriad's lost chestplate, but his luck remains missing...

monumenta:quests/r2/thedoctorsorders.title: The Doctor's Orders
monumenta:quests/r2/thedoctorsorders.description: You helped find a 'cure' for the queen of Frostgate and learned the Apothecary Specialization. Found in Frostgate.

monumenta:quests/r2/theendchimes.title: The End Chimes
monumenta:quests/r2/theendchimes.description: Following the ramblings of a drunken pirate, you discovered the ghost ship of Captain Varcosa - the Black Mist.

monumenta:quests/r2/theforeignsoldier.title: The Foreign Soldier
monumenta:quests/r2/theforeignsoldier.description: You searched out information about the truth of the war, and ended up siding with a nation.

monumenta:quests/r2/theroostercrowsatmid.title: The Rooster Crows at Midnight
monumenta:quests/r2/theroostercrowsatmid.description: You've proven yourself to the Night Roosters and joined their ranks.

monumenta:quests/r2/treasureforthefuture.title: Treasure for the Future
monumenta:quests/r2/treasureforthefuture.description: You discovered ruins beneath the Silver Tower, and activated an ancient mechanism. The ruins collapsed behind you as you escaped, leaving the artifacts and the knight sealed within...

monumenta:quests/r2/treasureofthepast.title: Treasure of the Past
monumenta:quests/r2/treasureofthepast.description: You've found an ancient temple of the Viridian Empire and retrieved a cursed artifact.

monumenta:quests/r2/unyieldingpotential.title: Unyielding Potential
monumenta:quests/r2/unyieldingpotential.description: You defeated Richter the Unyielding and learned the Swordsage Specialization. Found in the Chillwind Overworld.

monumenta:quests/r2/vitalneeds.title: Vital Needs
monumenta:quests/r2/vitalneeds.description: Now with the Doctor's ingredients retrieved, you have gained access to his remedy in Mistport!

monumenta:quests/r2/voyageofdiscovery.title: Voyage of Discovery
monumenta:quests/r2/voyageofdiscovery.description: You assembled your pirate crew once again and embarked on a journey to the Celsian Isles.

monumenta:quests/r2/whatlieswithin.title: What Lies Within
monumenta:quests/r2/whatlieswithin.description: You unlocked your subconscious through meditation and learned the Elementalist Specialization. Found in the Ishnir Overworld.

monumenta:quests/r2/wizardsapprentice.title: The Wizard's Apprentice
monumenta:quests/r2/wizardsapprentice.description: You investigated the death of Vargos' apprentice and found Xeno at the center of the incident.

monumenta:quests/r2/xenophobia.title: Xenophobia
monumenta:quests/r2/xenophobia.description: You searched out clues for Xeno and discovered his connection with Calder.

monumenta:quests/r3/acharmingproposition.title: A Charming Proposition
monumenta:quests/r3/acharmingproposition.description: You learned more about Charms, and conquered Vibrant Hollow.

monumenta:quests/r3/asiriusproblem.title: A Sirius Problem
monumenta:quests/r3/asiriusproblem.description: You met up with Silver Knight Tuulen once again, discovering an imminent threat in Star Point.

monumenta:quests/r3/assisteddreaming.title: Assisted Dreaming
monumenta:quests/r3/assisteddreaming.description: After an adventure with Reynart through your dreams, you stumbled across the Exalted Dungeons hub!

monumenta:quests/r3/behindthestarlitshro.title: Behind the Starlit Shroud
monumenta:quests/r3/behindthestarlitshro.description: Following the trail of Stargazers from the King's Valley, you discovered a path to the Serebrium Citadel and danger aplenty.

monumenta:quests/r3/cureforinsomnia.title: Cure for Insomnia
monumenta:quests/r3/cureforinsomnia.description: You passed out after performing a ritual, and woke up inside The Gallery of Fear.

monumenta:quests/r3/externalcorruption.title: External Corruption
monumenta:quests/r3/externalcorruption.description: You discovered the secrets of the Exalted Reverie, and learned more of the past of the dreamscape.

monumenta:quests/r3/forwhomthebelltolls.title: For Whom the Bell Tolls
monumenta:quests/r3/forwhomthebelltolls.description: After exploring around Star Point, you discovered and unlocked all of the bell towers.

monumenta:quests/r3/hisfaithfulservant.title: His Faithful Servant
monumenta:quests/r3/hisfaithfulservant.description: You discovered the Shrines of the Architect's Ring, alongside Cadeus.

monumenta:quests/r3/intothewoods.title: Into the Woods
monumenta:quests/r3/intothewoods.description: You assisted the city of Galengarde with a number of tasks to earn an audience with their leaders.

monumenta:quests/r3/keeperagents.title: Keeper Agents
monumenta:quests/r3/keeperagents.description: You uncovered a dark secret about the doctor of New Antium with help from the High Priest.

monumenta:quests/r3/newantium.title: New Antium
monumenta:quests/r3/newantium.description: Discover the City of New Antium

monumenta:quests/r3/ofmushroomsandmagic.title: Of Mushrooms and Magic
monumenta:quests/r3/ofmushroomsandmagic.description: You attempted to make peace with the Mycelia, but instead found allies within the Coven.

monumenta:quests/r3/portmanteau.title: Port Manteau
monumenta:quests/r3/portmanteau.description: Discover the Dock Town of Port Manteau

monumenta:quests/r3/praetorerstrike.title: Praetorer Strike
monumenta:quests/r3/praetorerstrike.description: You battled through a Shade-infested Point of Interest to help the Praetor of New Antium.

monumenta:quests/r3/ringaroundtherose.title: Ring Around the Rose
monumenta:quests/r3/ringaroundtherose.description: You assisted a group of researchers in order to figure out how to reach the Architect's Ring.

monumenta:quests/r3/rowantree.title: Rowantree
monumenta:quests/r3/rowantree.description: Discover the witchy town of Rowantree

monumenta:quests/r3/scientistsofsteelmel.title: Scientists of Steelmeld III
monumenta:quests/r3/scientistsofsteelmel.description: You rescued IOTA from Bermuda's malfunctioning lab.

monumenta:quests/r3/silentknight.title: Silent Knight
monumenta:quests/r3/silentknight.description: You learned about the festive season of Silvernalia while helping Gertrude find her stinky cat.

monumenta:quests/r3/sporetalcombat.title: Sporetal Combat
monumenta:quests/r3/sporetalcombat.description: You attended Conquort's Funeral, but were interrupted by the Abello requesting help to fight back against the Godspore.

monumenta:quests/r3/starlessnight.title: Starless Night
monumenta:quests/r3/starlessnight.description: Working with Silver Knight Tuulen and Aurora, you destroyed Sirius, the Final Herald of the Stars. Now the search for the Indigo Wool can begin in earnest.

monumenta:quests/r3/unconventionalmethod.title: Unconventional Methods
monumenta:quests/r3/unconventionalmethod.description: You scavanged tombs for Void and answers, while Calder wreaked havoc elsewhere.

monumenta:quests/r3/unraveled.title: Unraveled
monumenta:quests/r3/unraveled.description: You retrieved the Blue Wool from Samwell in the Masquerader's Ruin

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/abyssal.title: Abyssal
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/abyssal.description: While equipped, you deal an additional (level * 10)% damage if either you or the enemy you are damaging is in water.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/adaptabi.title: Adaptability
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/adaptabi.description: Allows secondary enchants (ex: Shielding, Reflexes, etc.) to all work with the defense type (Armor or Agility) you have the most of.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/adrenali.title: Adrenaline
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/adrenali.description: Upon attacking an enemy, you gain (level * 10)% speed for 3 seconds. Upon breaking a spawner with a pickaxe, you gain (level * 5)% speed for 6 seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/agility.title: Agility
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/agility.description: One of Monumenta's primary defensive stats, along with Armor. Multiplies received damage taken by 0.96^Agility. If Armor and Agility are mixed, damage is multiplied by 0.96^(Armor + Agility - 0.5 * Armor * Agility / (Armor + Agility))

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/anemia.title: Curse of Anemia
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/anemia.description: Reduces amount of healing received by (level * 10)%.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/aptitude.title: Aptitude
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/aptitude.description: Decreases the cooldown of all of your skills by 5% per level multiplicatively.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/aquaaffi.title: Aqua Affinity
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/aquaaffi.description: Allows you to mine blocks underwater as if you were on land.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/arcane_t.title: Arcane Thrust
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/arcane_t.description: Your melee attacks damage all enemies 3 blocks in front of you, in a 0.6-block-wide line, dealt as melee damage.  Damage: 1 + base damage * level / (level + 1)

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ardor.title: Ardor
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ardor.description: Mining a spawner outside of water grants you (level * 2)% speed for 4s. Mining a spawner underwater refreshes (level * 0.5) breath.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/armor.title: Armor
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/armor.description: One of Monumenta's primary defensive stats, along with Agility. Multiplies received damage taken by 0.96^Armor. If Armor and Agility are mixed, damage is multiplied by 0.96^(Armor + Agility - 0.5 * Armor * Agility / (Armor + Agility))

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ashesofe.title: Ashes of Eternity
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ashesofe.description: Applies the effect of Resurrection upon death while holding in mainhand. When a player triggers this effect, the enchant is marked as "Used" and becomes unusable to them until the next new day. The enchant is refreshed and mark is removed when clicking with the item in mainhand, if a new day has occurred since last use.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/aura.title: Aura
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/aura.description: Mobs in a 3 block radius from you are slowed by (level * 3)% for 0.5 seconds. This is refreshed as long as they are in range.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/barking.title: Barking
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/barking.description: Magically regrows the bark onto the logs you chop up.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/blastfra.title: Blast Fragility
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/blastfra.description: Multiplies blast damage taken by (0.96) ^ (-2 * level).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/blastpro.title: Blast Protection
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/blastpro.description: Multiplies blast damage taken by (0.96) ^ (2 * level).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/bleeding.title: Bleeding
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/bleeding.description: Applies Bleed (Enchantment level) for 5 seconds to all mobs struck by the Bleeding weapon. Bleed is a custom effect that applies (level * 10)% Slowness and Weakness to mobs under 50% Max Health.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/broomsti.title: Broomstick
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/broomsti.description: After being hurled using Riptide, apply slow falling until touching the ground.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/carapace.title: Carapace
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/carapace.description: After being hit by a mob, gain (level * 1.25)% damage reduction for 5 seconds, refreshed on being hit.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/celestia.title: Celestial
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/celestia.description: Deal 1.5 * level % more damage to enemies at a higher elevation than you.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/chaotic.title: Chaotic
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/chaotic.description: Your weapon deals anywhere between +Level and -Level damage, in integer increments. This effect is halved for sweep attacks. This only works in your main hand.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/choler.title: Choler
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/choler.description: Deal (level * 1)% additional damage to any mob that is on fire (vanilla or Inferno), slowed, or stunned.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/cloaked.title: Cloaked
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/cloaked.description: Gain (Level * 20)% effective Agility when there's 2 or less enemies within 5 blocks.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/colossal.title: Colossal
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/colossal.description: Items reinforced with Colossal don't take durability damage 50% of the time. Works with the Unbreaking enchant.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/consumab.title: Consumables
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/consumab.description: Enchantments that function on consumable items.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/corrupti.title: Curse of Corruption
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/corrupti.description: Holding or equipping one item is fine, but too much corruption is bad for you...

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/cosmetic.title: Cosmetic
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/cosmetic.description: Enchantments that grant a cosmetic effect to your items.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/cripplin.title: Curse of Crippling
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/cripplin.description: When under 50% health, your damage and movement speed is reduced by 10% per level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/cumberso.title: Cumbersome
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/cumberso.description: Critical attacks deal normal damage instead. Abilities that require critical attacks can still be activated with a critical attack.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/curses.title: Curses
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/curses.description: Curses that cause negative effects. Be careful!

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/darksigh.title: Darksight
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/darksigh.description: Gives night vision when held or worn.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/debarkin.title: Debarking
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/debarkin.description: Strips the bark off the logs you chop down.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/decapita.title: Decapitation
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/decapita.description: On a melee critical strike, deal (1.25 * level)% additional damage.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/decay.title: Decay
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/decay.description: Applies a Decay effect that deals 2 damage every (40 / level) ticks for 4 seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/defenses.title: Defenses
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/defenses.description: Enchantments that reduce the damage you take in some way or another.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/delve_in.title: Delve Infusions
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/delve_in.description: From the Depths and the Delves, offering special enchantments that can be specially added to your gear!

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/depthstr.title: Depth Strider
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/depthstr.description: Allows you to move faster by (level * 33)% when in water.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/divineau.title: Divine Aura
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/divineau.description: While equipped, the player and mobs hit gain an aura of divine particles.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/drilling.title: Drilling
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/drilling.description: Breaking a spawner destroys one extra Spawner Shield per level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/duelist.title: Duelist
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/duelist.description: Adds (level * 2) extra damage to melee hits against human-like mobs: illagers, vexes, witches, piglins, piglin brutes, golems, giants, allays, and wardens.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/earthasp.title: Earth Aspect
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/earthasp.description: Upon dealing melee damage, grants (level * 5)% damage reduction for 3 seconds. The same effect with half of the damage reduction applies when dealing projectile damage. Also applies upon mining a spawner.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/efficien.title: Efficiency
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/efficien.description: Increases the speed at which you break blocks with the enchanted item. If on an Axe, it also increases the chance of stunning a shield by an additional 5% per level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/empowere.title: Empowered
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/empowere.description: When you gain XP, you have a 0.25% chance per XP point per level to repair all currently equipped items by 1% of their max durability. There is also a slight prioritization to more damaged items.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ephemera.title: Curse of Ephemerality
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ephemera.description: All good things must come to an end. Will vanish when you log out, transfer shards, drop it, or try to move them to another inventory.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/epoch.title: Epoch
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/epoch.description: Class abilities cooldowns are reduced by (level * 1)%.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/eruption.title: Eruption
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/eruption.description: Mining a spawner deals (level * 4) damage to mobs within 5 blocks and apply the effects of Fire, Ice, Thunder, and Wind Aspects as well as Decay to affected mobs. Thunder Aspect applied via Eruption always stuns mobs, for (level * 0.5) seconds. Additionally, apply effects of Sapper and Adrenaline to players within 8 blocks, if the pickaxe used to mine the spawner has the enchantment.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ethereal.title: Ethereal
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ethereal.description: Gain (Level*20%) effective Agility on damage taken within 1.5 seconds of any previous damage from mobs.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/evasion.title: Evasion
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/evasion.description: Gain (Level*20%) effective Agility when taking damage from a source further than 4 blocks from the player.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/excavato.title: Excavator
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/excavato.description: Mine extra blocks in a 3 x 3 shape. Sneaking disables the effect.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/executio.title: Execution
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/executio.description: After killing an enemy, you deal (level * 1.5)% extra damage for 4 seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/exorcism.title: Exorcism
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/exorcism.description: Deals 15 damage and applies Slowness III to mobs summoned within the Valley of Forgotten Pharaohs.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/expedite.title: Expedite
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/expedite.description: Damaging an enemy with an ability increases your movement speed by (level * 0.75)% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/featherf.title: Feather Falling
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/featherf.description: Multiplies fall damage taken by (0.96) ^ (3 * level).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fervor.title: Fervor
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fervor.description: Deal 1.5% additional damage per level for 3s after gaining a buff that lasts at least 5s.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/festive.title: Festive
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/festive.description: While equipped, gain an aura of festive particles that improve with every additional item.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fireaspe.title: Fire Aspect
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fireaspe.description: Ignites the target for (level * 4) seconds when dealing melee or projectile damage.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/firefrag.title: Fire Fragility
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/firefrag.description: Multiplies fire damage taken by (0.96) ^ (-2 * level).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fireprot.title: Fire Protection
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fireprot.description: Multiplies fire damage taken by (0.96) ^ (2 * level). Reduces fire duration by 10% per level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/firststr.title: First Strike
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/firststr.description: The first melee hit against a mob deals 10 * level % more damage, and the first projectile damage against a mob deals 7.5 * level % more damage. Melee damage from enchantments or abilities will also be affected if it is applied simultaneously with a melee hit. The bonus damage can be reapplied to the same target every 3 seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/focus.title: Focus
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/focus.description: Gain (level * X)% projectile damage, where X is 1/1.25/1.5 in regions 1/2/3.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fortune.title: Fortune
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fortune.description: Increases the number of resources gained when breaking ores and certain other blocks that drop resources, based on level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fueled.title: Fueled
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/fueled.description: Gain 0.3% Damage Reduction per level for every enemy that is on fire (vanilla or Inferno), slowed, or stunned within 8 blocks, capped at 4 mobs.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/galvanic.title: Galvanic
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/galvanic.description: Gain a 1.25% chance per level to stun a mob for 2 seconds (0.5 seconds for elites) when dealing or taking non-ability melee or projectile damage.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/gilded.title: Gilded
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/gilded.description: While equipped, you gain an aura of gold particles. While dropped, your item gains similar particles. Additional items increase your particles, capped at 10. A reward for winning the voting raffle.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/gills.title: Gills
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/gills.description: While equipped or held, gain Water Breathing.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/guard.title: Guard
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/guard.description: Gain (Level * 20)% effective Armor after blocking with a shield. Duration lasts for 2.5s if blocked from offhand, and 5s from mainhand.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/hexeater.title: Hex Eater
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/hexeater.description: Adds (level * 0.5) extra damage per debuff on the target.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/hope.title: Hope
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/hope.description: If this item would be inflicted with more than 1 shatter level from a death, it takes 1 level less.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/iceaspec.title: Ice Aspect
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/iceaspec.description: Applies (level * 10)% Slowness for 4 seconds when dealing melee or projectile damage. Deals 1 extra damage to Blazes.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/impact.title: Impact
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/impact.description: For the next 2s after you attack a mob, deal an additional (level * 10)% of your physical attack's damage to the mob when they hit a wall, or if they fall from more than 3 blocks.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ineptitu.title: Ineptitude
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ineptitu.description: Increases the cooldown of all of your skills by 5% per level multiplicatively.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/inferno.title: Inferno
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/inferno.description: Ignited enemies take (level) ailment damage every second for the duration they are on fire. Subsequent reapplications of Inferno refresh its duration.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/infinity.title: Infinity
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/infinity.description: Your item gains infinite power. Bows never consume their arrow, crossbows return their loaded arrow, potions never go empty, and food never runs out.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/infusion.title: Infusions
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/infusion.description: Enchantments that can be specially added to your gear, should you pay the costs!

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/instabil.title: Curse of Instability
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/instabil.description: Randomizes the damage type of damage received when you get hit between Melee, Projectile, Magic, and Blast.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/instantd.title: Instant Drink
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/instantd.description: Right clicking a potion with this enchant will instantly apply its effects to the player using it.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/intoxica.title: Intoxicating Warmth
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/intoxica.description: When consumed, gain 1 hunger and 1 saturation per second for 12s. Cooldown: 30s.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/inure.title: Inure
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/inure.description: Gain (Level*20%) effective Armor when taking the same type of mob damage consecutively (Melee, Projectile, Blast, or Magic) within 60 seconds. Breaking Inure by taking a different type of damage will give half the bonus for 1 hit.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/irrepara.title: Curse of Irreparability
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/irrepara.description: Some items are too fragile to be repaired...

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/junglesn.title: Jungle's Nourishment
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/junglesn.description: When consumed, restore all hunger, gain 40% Instant Health, and gain 20% Resistance for 5s. Cooldown: 25s.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/knockbac.title: Knockback
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/knockbac.description: Adds (level * 3) blocks to your knockback on melee strikes.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/lifedrai.title: Life Drain
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/lifedrai.description: Your critical melee attacks heal you. Normal melee attacks also heal you, but for less.  Healing (falling attack): √(level) Healing (non-falling attack): 0.5 * √(level) / √(attack speed) * attack cooldown

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/liquidco.title: Liquid Courage
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/liquidco.description: When consumed, gain 8 hunger, 8 saturation, and 20% Resistance against 3 incoming Melee, Projectile or Magic attacks for 15s. Cooldown: 30s.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/locked.title: Locked
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/locked.description: Prevents the item from being swapped by a lockbox.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/looting.title: Looting
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/looting.description: Increases common loot drops by (Enchantment level) chances.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/lure.title: Lure
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/lure.description: Decreases the time spent waiting for a fish to appear by (level * 5) seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/magicfra.title: Magic Fragility
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/magicfra.description: Multiplies magic damage taken by (0.96) ^ (-2 * level).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/magicpro.title: Magic Protection
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/magicpro.description: Multiplies magic damage taken by (0.96) ^ (2 * level).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/material.title: Material
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/material.description: A special item, used to craft another item - often Patron related ones. Items with this enchant also can be used as crafting materials in regular vanilla Minecraft recipes.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/meleefra.title: Melee Fragility
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/meleefra.description: Multiplies melee damage taken by (0.96) ^ (-2 * level).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/meleepro.title: Melee Protection
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/meleepro.description: Multiplies melee damage taken by (0.96) ^ (2 * level).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/mending.title: Mending
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/mending.description: Items with Mending that are worn or held repair 2 durability per xp orb consumed, chosen at random among your items with Mending.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/mitosis.title: Mitosis
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/mitosis.description: Mining a spawner debuffs all enemies in a 5 block radius with (level * 3.75)% Weaken for 3 seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/multiloa.title: Multiload
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/multiloa.description: Upon reloading your crossbow, consume up to (level) extra arrows. For each arrow consumed, instantly reload crossbow after firing.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/multisho.title: Multishot
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/multisho.description: Crossbows enchanted with Multishot fire 3 projectiles at once in a spread pattern. Only one projectile is consumed and only one out of the 3 can be picked up off the ground.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/multitoo.title: Multitool
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/multitoo.description: Allows a tool to change shape when you right-click with it. Level I lets it to cycle between a shovel and an axe, or a compass and shears, depending on the item. Level II additionally lets it cycle to being a pickaxe.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/natant.title: Natant
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/natant.description: You move (level * 4)% faster when in water.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/passivee.title: Passives
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/passivee.description: Enchantments that grant a passive effect when used or worn.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/perspica.title: Perspicacity
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/perspica.description: Gain (level * X)% magic damage, where X is 1/1.25/1.5 in regions 1/2/3.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/phylacte.title: Phylactery
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/phylacte.description: Dying with an item infused with Phylactery saves (10% * level) of your experience points in your grave. This stacks additively with itself across all items equipped. Experience will only be saved if you died with more than 100 experience points. Additionally, keep potion effects upon dying for (5% * level) of the duration.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/piercing.title: Piercing
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/piercing.description: Lets arrows pass through up to the number of entities equal to the enchantment level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/pointbla.title: Point Blank
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/pointbla.description: Projectiles deal an additional (level * 2) damage if the enemy is within 8 blocks.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/poise.title: Poise
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/poise.description: Gain (Level*20%) effective Armor when above 90% Max Health. Half of the bonus is granted when above 70% Max Health.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/projecti.title: Projectile Fragility
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/projecti.description: Multiplies projectile damage taken by (0.96) ^ (-2 * level).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/projecti.title: Projectile Protection
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/projecti.description: Multiplies projectile damage taken by (0.96) ^ (2 * level).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/quake.title: Quake
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/quake.description: When your melee attack kills an enemy, all nearby enemies in a 3-block cube take (level * 5)% of the damage dealt. Your weapon's Fire/Ice/Thunder Aspect, Decay and/or Bleed also get applied.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/quench.title: Quench
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/quench.description: Increase duration of consumable's effects by 2.5% per level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/quick_ch.title: Quick Charge
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/quick_ch.description: Decreases the time it takes to load a crossbow by (level * 0.25) seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/radiant.title: Radiant
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/radiant.description: While held in your main hand, gain Glowing and Night Vision for 30s. You must be the soulbound owner of your item for this to work.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/rageofth.title: Rage of the Keter
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/rageofth.description: When consumed, gain 4 hunger, 4 saturation, a +20% damage buff to melee, magic, and projectile damage, and +15% speed for 15s. Cooldown: 25s.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ranged.title: Ranged
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/ranged.description: Enchantments that grant special ranged effects.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/recoil.title: Recoil
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/recoil.description: When fired, your crossbow knocks you back a short distance, increasing with level. Crouching while firing prevents the recoil, but places crossbows on cooldown for 0.5 seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/reflecti.title: Reflection
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/reflecti.description: 1 second after taking magic or blast damage, deal (level * 6)% of the damage to all mobs in a 4 block radius.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/reflexes.title: Reflexes
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/reflexes.description: Gain (Level*20%) effective Agility when there are 4 or more enemies within 8 blocks.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/refresh.title: Refresh
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/refresh.description: Reduces the cooldown of infinite consumables by 2% per level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/regenera.title: Regeneration
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/regenera.description: When equipped, regain sqrt(level) / 12 health 4 times per second.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/regicide.title: Regicide
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/regicide.description: While equipped, deal an additional (level * 10)% damage to Elite and Boss enemies.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/respirat.title: Respiration
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/respirat.description: Extends your breathing time underwater by (level * 15) seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/resurrec.title: Resurrection
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/resurrec.description: When you are about to die, this item provides 8 Absorption for 5 sconds, Regeneration 2 for 45 seconds, and Fire Resistance for 40 seconds, destroying itself in the process.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/retaliat.title: Retaliation
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/retaliat.description: After blocking damage, gain a damage bonus for 4s based on the type of enemy blocked (35%/50%/65% for normal/elite/boss, halved when dealing magic/projectile damage). Certain blocked debuffs will infuse the first basic melee/projectile attack in this period with an effect corresponding to the blocked debuffs.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/retrieva.title: Retrieval
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/retrieva.description: Arrows have a (level * 10)% chance to not be consumed.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/revelati.title: Revelation
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/revelati.description: Items infused with Revelation increase the level of any Delve infusion on the item by one level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/reverb.title: Reverb
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/reverb.description: On kill by melee strike or basic projectile attack, deal (10 * level)% of your overkill damage plus (5 * level)% of your highest damage source within the killing attack to an enemy within 8 blocks. Enemies killed by this damage can also trigger Reverb.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/riptide.title: Riptide
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/riptide.description: A Trident with Riptide can only be thrown when in water. When this happens, you are launched with your Trident a distance based on your Riptide level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/root.title: Custom Enchantments
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/root.description: Enchantments found while adventuring in Monumenta.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/rustwort.title: Rustworthy
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/rustwort.description: Curses mined copper to gather rust depending on the level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sapper.title: Sapper
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sapper.description: Restore (Enchantment Level) health by breaking a spawner.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/second_w.title: Second Wind
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/second_w.description: Damage from attacks applied to the lower half of your max health is multiplied by 0.9^(level). Attacks received while under this threshold get their damage reduced; attacks that bring you under this threshold have the portion of the damage that is applied past the threshold reduced.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/shieldin.title: Shielding
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/shieldin.description: Gain Level*20% effective Armor when taking damage from an enemy within 2.5 blocks. Taking damage that would stun a shield and activates Shielding reduces Shielding's effect to half for 5 seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/shrapnel.title: Curse of Shrapnel
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/shrapnel.description: When used to break a spawner, take (level) damage. This damages armor and bypasses damage reductions.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/silktouc.title: Silk Touch
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/silktouc.description: Allows blocks to drop as themselves instead of their normal drop, when broken with an item with this enchantment.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/slayer.title: Slayer
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/slayer.description: Adds (level * 2) extra damage to melee hits against non-Undead, non-human-like mobs: Spiders, Cave Spiders, Creepers, Endermen, Blazes, Ghasts, Slimes, Magma Cubes, Silverfish, Bees, Shulkers, Wolves, Ravagers, Hoglins, and passive animal mobs.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/smite.title: Smite
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/smite.description: Adds (level * 2) extra damage to melee hits against Undead mobs.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sniper.title: Sniper
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sniper.description: Projectiles deal an additional (level * 2) damage if the enemy is further than 12 blocks.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/snowy.title: Snowy
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/snowy.description: While you have an item with this enchantment in your inventory, you are able to be hit by other players with a Snowball Launcher. Be careful!

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/soothing.title: Soothing
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/soothing.description: Regenerate 0.04 health per level each second.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/soulspee.title: Soul Speed
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/soulspee.description: When on soul sand or soul soil, your speed will increase by (level * 10.5)%.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/spell_po.title: Spell Power
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/spell_po.description: Increases the damage of spells (+20% Spell Power increases the damage of all spells by 20%, for example), and only works with Mage skills. Spell Power stacks with the Magic Damage attribute.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/stamina.title: Stamina
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/stamina.description: After taking damage, gain (level * 2.5)% melee and projectile damage per level for 6 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times, for (level * 10)% max damage.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/starvati.title: Starvation
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/starvati.description: Depletes your saturation and current hunger points by (Enchantment level) upon consuming the item cursed with Starvation. It fully depletes saturation, then moves on to removing hunger points.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/stasis.title: Stasis
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/stasis.description: While Stasis is active, you are immovable, immune to all damage and effects, and cannot use any interactions or abilities.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/stat_tra.title: Stat Track
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/stat_tra.description: Designates that an item has had stat tracking added to it via a Patron. Stats are only tracked if used by the person who added it as long as they're still a patron. A variety of different stats can be tracked, such as Mobs Killed, Times Consumed, Boss Damage Dealt, and more! Consider becoming a patron if you aren't one already to gain access to this perk.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/steadfas.title: Steadfast
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/steadfas.description: Gain (0.33% * Level) Armor per 1% health lost, up to (20% * Level) Armor.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sturdy.title: Sturdy
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sturdy.description: Reduces the duration shields are stunned for by 5% per level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sustenan.title: Sustenance
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sustenan.description: Increases amount of healing received by (level * 10)%.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sweeping.title: Sweeping Edge
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/sweeping.description: Increases sweep damage by (1 + Attack Damage * (level / (level + 1))).

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/techniqu.title: Technique
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/techniqu.description: When damaging a mob within 3 blocks, deal 10 * level % more magic and melee ability (not physical) damage, and 7.5 * level % more projectile damage.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/tempo.title: Tempo
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/tempo.description: Gain (Level*20%) effective Agility on the first hit taken after 4 seconds of taking no damage from mobs. Half of the bonus is granted after 2 seconds of taking no damage from mobs.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/temporal.title: Temporal Bender
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/temporal.description: When consumed, gain 4 hunger, 4 saturation, and +100% Ability Cooldown Recharge Rate for 5s. Cooldown: 30s.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/thorns_d.title: Thorns Damage
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/thorns_d.description: Deal (level) damage to a mob when it damages you with melee or projectile damage.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/throwing.title: Throwing Knife
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/throwing.description: Right-clicking consumes the item, instantly launching an arrow that deals 7-9 damage and applies the respective effects if the arrow is tipped.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/thundera.title: Thunder Aspect
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/thundera.description: Has a (level * 10)% chance to stun a mob for 2 seconds (0.5 for Elites) when dealing melee damage, or for 0.5 seconds (0 for Elites) when dealing projectile damage. Deals 1 extra damage to Guardians and Iron Golems.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/tools.title: Tools and Utility
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/tools.description: Enchantments that grant a helpful effect to your tools and weapons.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/triage.title: Triage
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/triage.description: Increases the amount of healing you do to others by (level * 5)%.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/trivium.title: Trivium
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/trivium.description: When hitting 3 or more mobs with a magical ability, deal (level * 10)% more magic damage.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/two_hand.title: Two Handed
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/two_hand.description: Some items simply cannot be used correctly if your hands are full... Reduces attack damage, attack speed, and spell power of the item, reduces player movement speed, and restricts the ability to throw/shoot projectiles if held while also having an offhand equipped. Two-handed swords count as holding two swords for sake of Rogue abilities.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/unbreaki.title: Unbreaking
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/unbreaki.description: Makes gear break (level + 1)x slower. Works the same on tools, weapons, and armor.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/understa.title: Understanding
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/understa.description: All non-Delve Infusions you are currently benefitting from gain (Understanding level * .2) levels.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/unrustwo.title: Unrustworthy
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/unrustwo.description: Removes all rust from mined copper.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/unyieldi.title: Unyielding
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/unyieldi.description: Increases your Knockback Resistance by 0.6 per level.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/usurper.title: Usurper
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/usurper.description: Heal (level * 2.5)% of your max health whenever you slay an elite or boss enemy.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/vanishin.title: Curse of Vanishing
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/vanishin.description: When held in inventory, an item with Curse of Vanishing shatters upon death. Curse of Vanishing II will cause the item to be completely deleted upon death.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/veil.title: Curse of the Veil
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/veil.description: When equipped, drain (level) health every 3 seconds. This damage cannot kill you, and only triggers if there is a hostile mob within 24 blocks, Boss mob within 80 blocks, or the player has dealt damage within the last 12 seconds.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/vengeful.title: Vengeful
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/vengeful.description: Deal (level * 2)% additional damage to the last mob that damaged you.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/vigor.title: Vigor
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/vigor.description: Gain (level * X)% melee damage, where X is 1/1.25/1.5 in regions 1/2/3.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/waxoff.title: Wax Off
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/waxoff.description: Removes wax from mined copper as your master taught you.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/waxon.title: Wax On
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/waxon.description: Applies wax to mined copper as your master taught you.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/weapons.title: Weapons
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/weapons.description: Enchantments that alter your attacks and increase the damage of them.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/weightle.title: Weightless
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/weightle.description: May be held in the offhand without incurring a debuff from the Two Handed curse.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/windaspe.title: Wind Aspect
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/windaspe.description: Launch mobs hit by (Level * 1.5) blocks and applies Slow Falling for 1 second.

monumenta:handbook/enchantments/worldly_.title: Worldly Protection
monumenta:handbook/enchantments/worldly_.description: While held, grants 5% damage reduction per level in King's Valley areas, 7.5% damage reduction per level in Celsian Isles areas, and 10% damage reduction per level in Architect's Ring areas. However, damage dealt is reduced by 25% per level. Additionally, items with this enchantment are not affected by region restriction debuffs.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ac.title: Narsen Academy
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ac.description: Here you may change your class and skills at any time. If you're looking for a quest, Sybil may be able to point you in the right direction.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ap.title: Apartments
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ap.description: For a small amount of XP, you can get three Ender Chest Expansions for all your storage needs. Also the home of the snowman embassy.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ca.title: Rock's Little Casino
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ca.description: Every Casino Chip grants a prize, some more fabulous than others - none moreso than the Epic King's Warden!

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ca.title: Castle Narsen
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ca.description: Here you can found or join a guild, purchase a plot, see all our patrons, get info about Team Monumenta, or meet the King of the Narsens.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ci.title: Dr Volkamph's Circus
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ci.description: Trade your Tier 1 through 5 for circus tickets! Save up for animal spawn eggs and the Epic King's Sabatons!

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ci.title: City Guide
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ci.description: She has maps and survival gear all for free in the Sierhaven plaza, with the P.E.B. Station and the Nexus entrance nearby.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/cr.title: Crafter
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/cr.description: Guarded by the Tlaxans, these devices allow crafting items that can't be obtained in any other way.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ct.title: C'Taz
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ct.description: A Tlaxan shaman, known for brewing elixirs and potions. Coordinates: x=240 y=78 z=303

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/fa.title: Farr
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/fa.description: A Narsen town built from ruins of Tlaxan architecture Coordinates: x=569 y=98 z=189

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/he.title: King's Herald
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/he.description: Every day the Herald offers a bounty in a POI. Complete the bounty, then talk to the Herald for your reward. The harder the POI, the better the reward. There are two available bounties a day on weekends.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/hi.title: Highwatch
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/hi.description: A fortified keep protecting a mystical structure Coordinates: x=1190 y=137 z=-114

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ho.title: Hot Springs
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ho.description: Give yourself a glowing aura, cleanse yourself and arrows of effects, or just relax and rejuvenate in the mystical Ta'Eldim hot springs.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/in.title: Infusion Altar
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/in.description: Hidden away in the city of Ta'Eldim, this sacred altar can make your equipment stronger.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/lo.title: Lowtide
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/lo.description: A quaint lakeside town beside a massive seagate Coordinates: x=715 y=74 z=483

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/mo.title: The Monument of the Valley
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/mo.description: Five wools with magical properties must be found, one in each of the Region 1 Wool Dungeons. To reach Region 2, you need to Complete the Monument.  Region 1 Wool Monument

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ny.title: Nyr
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ny.description: A small town overlooking a scorched battleground Coordinates: x=-141 y=95 z=-79

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/oc.title: Oceangate
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/oc.description: A mighty bastion guarding the route from the Valley Coordinates: x=-1634 y=122 z=98

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/pa.title: Shrine to the Benevolent
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/pa.description: Patrons can activate this shrine to grant buffs to the whole server. and can apply stat tracking to their items at the nearby Sierhaven Tracker. If you wish to change what messages the patron shrine sends you or toggle what effects you want to get, interact with it and select options.  Region 1 Patreon Shrine

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ro.title: The King's Valley
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ro.description: A luxuriant landscape, scarred from a recent war.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/se.title: Seasonal Pass Hub
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/se.description: This room serves as the hub for the amazing Seasonal Pass events that are run regularly in Monumenta.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/si.title: Sierhaven
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/si.description: The shining capital of the King's Valley Coordinates: x=-766 y=107 z=72

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ta.title: Ta'Eldim
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/ta.description: A hidden sanctuary of the Tlaxan people Coordinates: x=480 y=191 z=-349

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/te.title: The King's Station
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/te.description: Fast travel to towns, plots, dungeons and more!  Region 1 Teleport Hub

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/tr.title: Transmogrifier
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r1/tr.description: The Transmogrifier can be used to recycle unwanted items into something more useful! - Transmogrifications require a Power Crystal or greater in order to use. - Four Tier V items give you Pulsating Dust. - Two Rare items give you a random Rare item.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ac.title: The Teacher's Domain
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ac.description: Here you can change your class and skills at any time. The Teacher may also help you unlock new abilities to empower your class.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/al.title: Alnera
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/al.description: The bustling capital of the Ishnir Empire Coordinates: x=352 y=84 z=765

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/bl.title: King Barbossa's Black Market
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/bl.description: Find salvage traders from cities across the Isles selling Unique items thought lost.  Region 2 Unique Buybacks

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/br.title: Breachpoint
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/br.description: An underwater outpost built to investigate the depths of the world Coordinates: x=-702 y=10 z=-186

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ca.title: The Floating Carnival
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ca.description: Exchange your Tier 2 through Tier 4 items for Carnival Tokens to play minigames and win prizes!

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ca.title: Monarch's Cozy Casino
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ca.description: Every Casino Chip grants a prize, some more fabulous than others. Comfortably try your hand to get the Epic Frost Giant's Crown!

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/de.title: Delve Infusion Station
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/de.description: A curious machine that allows you to further enhance your equipment.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/do.title: Mistport Docks
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/do.description: A multitude of ships dock here, including a ship carrying a mystical Seer who can tell you your fate. The dock ships will depart and new ships will lay anchor over time.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/fr.title: Frostgate
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/fr.description: An oceanside citadel and capital of the Chillwind Empire Coordinates: x=-1519 y=98 z=968

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/in.title: Infusion Altar
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/in.description: This invention of a long lost civilization will enable you to strengthen your equipment.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/mi.title: Mistport
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/mi.description: A small haven of piracy and lawlessness Coordinates: x=-763 y=84 z=1321

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/mo.title: Molta
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/mo.description: A mining town amidst the ruins of other expeditions Coordinates: x=206 y=103 z=80

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/mo.title: The Monument of the Isles
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/mo.description: As with before, six powerful Wool blocks must be placed atop this hallowed altar. Scour the dungeons of the Celsian Isles to Complete the Monument!  Region 2 Wool Monument

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ni.title: Nightroost
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ni.description: A hilltop village ravaged by a threat still looming Coordinates: x=-1315 y=129 z=513

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/pa.title: Pedestal o' Patrons
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/pa.description: Patrons can activate this shrine to grant buffs to the whole server. If you wish to change what messages the patron shrine sends you or toggle what effects you want to get, interact with it and select options.  Region 2 Patreon Shrine

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ra.title: Rahkeri
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ra.description: A trade town now used as a vantage point for military operations Coordinates: x=-121 y=166 z=449

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/re.title: Ronevo's Repairs and Recycling
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/re.description: The dwelling of Repairman Ronevo. You can repair items here, as well as sell tiered items.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ro.title: The Celsian Isles
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/ro.description: A large archipelago, split between frost and flame.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/se.title: Shipwreck Seeker
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/se.description: An avid diver who has built up a collection of relics. He's willing to trade them for Gleaming Seashells.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/st.title: Steelmeld
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/st.description: An isolated underwater base built from an unknown time Coordinates: x=-584 y=8 z=-474

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/te.title: Seascour Trading Hub
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/te.description: Fast travel to towns, plots, dungeons and more!  Region 2 Teleport Hub

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/tr.title: Transmogrifier
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/tr.description: The Transmogrifier can be used to recycle unwanted items into something more useful! - Transmogrifications require a Magma Crystal or greater in order to use. - Four Tier V items give you Pulsating Powder. - Two Rare items give you a random Rare item.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/wi.title: Wispervale
