monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r2/wi.description: A town of magic in a culture where magic is shunned Coordinates: x=-1760 y=132 z=-16

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/ac.title: The Professor
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/ac.description: Here you can select and change your class / specialization at any time. Learn more on how you can further increase your combat capabilities with The Professor via skill enhancements!

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/ca.title: Sticks and Stones Tavern
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/ca.description: A Casino in an unlikely place, ran by an even more unlikely staff. Every Casino Chip grants a prize, try your hand at obtaining the Epic Consumables!

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/fa.title: Fatekeeper
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/fa.description: Check with the Fatekeeper to determine your destiny. You can change your overworld delve modifiers with the Fatekeeper.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/ga.title: Galengarde
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/ga.description: A safe haven for the Dichen and capital of the region, established around a colossal tree. Coordinates: x=-304 y=83 z=-655

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/in.title: Infusion Altar
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/in.description: The technique to imbue power into equipment, will allow you to strengthen your gear and trascend mortal limits.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/li.title: Library
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/li.description: Consult the Seanchaidh to reveal your fate. Come here to obtain a bounty and conquer it for unique rewards!

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/ma.title: Masterwork Anvil
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/ma.description: The Masterwork Anvil is a new system to awaken your equipment's true capabilities using rare materials related to the item's origins.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/ne.title: New Antium
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/ne.description: The remnants of a thriving civilization, bound by hunger and haunted by shades. Coordinates: x=-449 y=181 z=-75

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/pa.title: Altar of Altruism
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/pa.description: Patrons can activate this shrine to grant buffs to the whole server. If you wish to change what messages the patron shrine sends you or toggle what effects you want to get, interact with it and select options.  Region 3 Patreon Shrine

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/po.title: Port Manteau
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/po.description: A picturesque fishing town on the northern coast of the Wolfswood, overlooked by the capital. Coordinates: x=-458 y=46 z=-916

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/ro.title: The Architect's Ring
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/ro.description: A secluded and isolated land, hidden away from the rest of the world.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/te.title: R3 Teleport Hub
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/te.description: Fast travel to towns, plots, dungeons and more!  Region 3 Teleport Hub

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/wo.title: Workshop
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/r3/wo.description: The Workshop is the place where you can repair items, sell tiered items and transmogrify items... all in one spot! - Transmogrifications require scented candles produced and sold by Hagatha. - Four Tier III items gives you Pulsating Shard. - Two Rare Items give you a random Rare Item.

monumenta:handbook/important_sites/root.title: Important Locations
monumenta:handbook/important_sites/root.description: Places you may want to revisit.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ar/archite.title: Architect's Ring Items
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ar/archite.description: Items from Region 3, the Architect's Ring!           - Maximum item tier is Tier 3, which can be transmogrified into Pulsating Shards. - Wearing these in R1 or R2 incurs a heavy debuff. - Rare Items and up includes a new upgrading system, Masterwork!

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ar/charm.title: Architect's Ring: Charm
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ar/charm.description: Trinkets which further enhances your skills! - Charms are special equipment that enhances your abilities, and even some enchantments! - You need Charm Power to equip a Charm, and cannot equip two of the same Charms. Usually, the more powerful a Charm is, the more Charm Power it uses, - You start out with 9 Charm Power, as you explore Ring, you may acquire even more Charm Power. - Furthermore, there are some interesting folks out there that have the ability to combine charms together, making them stronger!

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ar/epiccha.title: Architect's Ring: Epic Charms
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ar/epiccha.description: Trinkets from Fiction and Folklore! - Epic Charms are obtained via various special expensive means. - There is no further upgrade that can be made this charm, they can only be traded with other players.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ar/fish.title: Architect's Ring: Fish
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ar/fish.description: Plentiful sea creatures of The Architect's Ocean! - Fish can be caught all over The Architect's Ring, with a number of bizarre qualities. - These fish probably shouldn't be consumed, but certain vendors may be interested!

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ar/masterw.title: Masterwork Items
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ar/masterw.description: Upgradable Items exclusive to Architect's Ring! - Most items with a rarity of Rare or above in the Architect's Ring start off with a Masterwork rank. - Items in earlier parts of the region may start out weak, but using special materials, these items can be upgraded to be much more powerful, even changing its rarity! - As a silver lining, items of similar Masterwork Rank should have a similar power level. - Consult the Masterwork Anvil for more information!

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ar/rarecha.title: Architect's Ring: Rare Charms
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ar/rarecha.description: Rarer and Unique Trinkets! - Rare Charms are often unique charms found only in a specific biome, dungeon or quests. - These charms cannot be upgraded, but contains unique effects unlike normal charms.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ci/celsian.title: Celsian Isles Items
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/ci/celsian.description: Items from Region 2, the Celsian Isles! - Use the same tiers as King's Valley items, but much stronger. - Wearing these in R1 makes you take 200% more damage and 10% slower. - Holding these in R1 gives you Mining Fatigue 1 and lowers your damage by 50%.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/1.title: King's Valley : Tier I
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/1.description: You have to start somewhere. - Found in early POIs. - Can sell for money.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/2.title: King's Valley : Tier II
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/2.description: Not bad.                          - Found in early POIs. - Can sell for money. - Can sell for a Circus Ticket.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/3.title: King's Valley : Tier III
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/3.description: Getting better.                - Found in most POIs. - Can sell for money. - Can sell for a Circus Ticket.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/4.title: King's Valley : Tier IV
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/4.description: Pretty good!                - Found in late-game POIs. - Can sell for money. - Can sell for a Circus Ticket.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/5.title: King's Valley : Tier V
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/5.description: The best of the common stuff! - Found rarely in the overworld, in dungeons, and in Bounties. - Can sell for money. - Can sell for 3 Circus Tickets. - Can transmogrify four for Pulsating Dust.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/artifac.title: King's Valley : Artifact
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/artifac.description: A reward for conquering some of Monumenta's toughest content. - Can turn into Artifact Fragments.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/epic.title: King's Valley : Epic
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/epic.description: The most powerful items in the King's Valley. - Obtained by various expensive means. - Can only be sold to players.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/legacy.title: King's Valley : Legacy
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/legacy.description: Just because it's old doesn't mean it's good. - Items that were previously obtainable that can no longer be looted or purchased from traders. - Can only be obtained from players who still have them. - Can only be sold to players. - No longer have enchantments, attributes, effects, or other statistic changes.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/patron.title: King's Valley : Patron Made
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/patron.description: Designed by our Patrons, and useable by anyone! - Found and crafted in all sorts of ways. - Can only be sold to players.

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/rare.title: King's Valley : Rare
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/rare.description: These are really good for the area! - Specific to their dungeon, or King's Valley's overworld. - Can turn into Rare Fragments. - Can transmogrify 2 into a random Rare. - Some rares from dungeons can be enhanced!

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/uncommo.title: King's Valley : Uncommon
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/uncommo.description: Can only be reliably found in a few places. - Found in specific POIs and dungeons. - Can sell for money. - Can sell for a Circus Ticket. - Some uncommons from points of interest can be enhanced!

monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/unique.title: King's Valley : Unique
monumenta:handbook/item_tiers/kv/unique.description: Usually better than other items nearby, but there's only one... right? - Quest reward. - Can only be sold to players. - For enough CXP and Pulsating Dust, a Shady Trader may be able to replace them.

monumenta:handbook/mobs/elites.title: Elite Mobs
monumenta:handbook/mobs/elites.description: Elites have gold names and tend to be more dangerous than normal mobs.

monumenta:handbook/mobs/player_death.title: So you've died...
monumenta:handbook/mobs/player_death.description: Happens to everyone. You will not lose your stuff, but equipped items (armor and offhand) are "Shattered", a stacking debuff with a limit of 3 levels. A Grave will spawn where you died. It is an armor stand cosmetically wearing the same equipped gear as you when you took your final blow. Clicking your grave will clear the grave, repairing one level of Shattering on each of the armor pieces affected by that death. For more information, use /help death A few tips: - Ask a player for help (some may help without being asked) - Keep backup gear in your plot/ender chest - Make sure you have the right gear

monumenta:handbook/mobs/root.title: Mobs and Combat
monumenta:handbook/mobs/root.description: Some tips on the combat mechanics of Monumenta.

monumenta:handbook/mobs/shattered.title: Shattered Items
monumenta:handbook/mobs/shattered.description: When you die, your equipped items are left in a shattered state. Each level of Shattered gives a small (4%) penalty to damage and damage resistance. If collecting your grave didn't completely restore your items, they must be repaired with an anvil. Anvils can be bought at a Repairman, which can be found at the forge in Sierhaven. For more information, use /help death

monumenta:handbook/money/ac.title: Adventurer's Crystal
monumenta:handbook/money/ac.description: Reward for conquering an amplified location. Used for trades with the Plot Assistant Coordinator.

monumenta:handbook/money/achip.title: Archite Chip
monumenta:handbook/money/achip.description: Casino Currency. Can be converted back to AR freely.

monumenta:handbook/money/ar.title: Archos Ring
monumenta:handbook/money/ar.description: AR; The basic currency of Architect's Ring.

monumenta:handbook/money/augments.title: Augments
monumenta:handbook/money/augments.description: Special Currency found in the Architect's Ring. Can be used to augment certain items.

monumenta:handbook/money/cchip.title: Crystalline Chip
monumenta:handbook/money/cchip.description: Casino currency. Can be converted to CCS and back freely.

monumenta:handbook/money/ccs.title: Compressed Crystalline Shard
monumenta:handbook/money/ccs.description: CCS; Used for more expensive trades. Can be converted to CS and back freely.

monumenta:handbook/money/chip.title: Chip
monumenta:handbook/money/chip.description: Casino currency. Can be converted to CXP and back freely.

monumenta:handbook/money/cs.title: Crystalline Shard
monumenta:handbook/money/cs.description: CS; The basic currency of the Celsian Isles.

monumenta:handbook/money/cxp.title: Concentrated Experience
monumenta:handbook/money/cxp.description: CXP; Used for more expensive trades. Can be converted to XP and back freely.

monumenta:handbook/money/discoveries.title: Item Discoveries
monumenta:handbook/money/discoveries.description: Discoveries are one-time collectibles that you can pick up by punching them. They contain various items, consumables, or currency. Discoveries come in three different rarities - Common, Rare, and Legendary.

monumenta:handbook/money/gc.title: Godtree Carving
monumenta:handbook/money/gc.description: GC; Reward for an Architect Bounty. Some items can only be purchased with these.

monumenta:handbook/money/gd.title: Gleaming Dust
monumenta:handbook/money/gd.description: Special currency given for breaking down Region 2 rare items into their base form in Dungeon Lobbies.

monumenta:handbook/money/gs.title: Gleaming Seashell
monumenta:handbook/money/gs.description: GS; Reward for a Celsian Bounty. Some items can only be purchased with these.

monumenta:handbook/money/har.title: Hyperchromatic Archos Ring
monumenta:handbook/money/har.description: HAR; Used for more expensive trades. Can be converted back to AR freely.

monumenta:handbook/money/hcs.title: Hyper Crystalline Shard
monumenta:handbook/money/hcs.description: HCS; Used for even more expensive trades. Can be converted to CCS and back freely.

monumenta:handbook/money/hxp.title: Hyperexperience
monumenta:handbook/money/hxp.description: HXP. Used for even more expensive trades. Can be converted to CXP and back freely.

monumenta:handbook/money/pd.title: Pulsating Dust
monumenta:handbook/money/pd.description: Special currency given for transmogrifying four Tier 5 items from region 1.

monumenta:handbook/money/pdia.title: Pulsating Diamond
monumenta:handbook/money/pdia.description: Special Currency given for combining two Silver Dust from region 3 at the Infusion Altar.

monumenta:handbook/money/pe.title: Pulsating Emerald
monumenta:handbook/money/pe.description: Special currency given for combining two Gleaming Dust from region 2 with Jean Bay at the Infusion Altar.

monumenta:handbook/money/pg.title: Pulsating Gold
monumenta:handbook/money/pg.description: Special currency given for combining two Royal Dust from region 1 with Keloch at the Infusion Altar.

monumenta:handbook/money/pp.title: Pulsating Powder
monumenta:handbook/money/pp.description: Special currency given for transmogrifying four Tier 5 items from region 2.

monumenta:handbook/money/ps.title: Pulsating Shard
monumenta:handbook/money/ps.description: Special Currency given for transmogrifying four Tier 3 items from region 3.

monumenta:handbook/money/rc.title: Royal Crystal
monumenta:handbook/money/rc.description: RC; Reward for the King's Bounty. Some items can only be purchased with these.

monumenta:handbook/money/rd.title: Royal Dust
monumenta:handbook/money/rd.description: Special currency given for breaking down Region 1 rare items into their base form in Dungeon Lobbies.

monumenta:handbook/money/root.title: Money
monumenta:handbook/money/root.description: It'll help you get the gear you want.

monumenta:handbook/money/scchip.title: Special Crystalline Chip
monumenta:handbook/money/scchip.description: Rigged casino currency. More likely to land a jackpot than a normal chip.

monumenta:handbook/money/sd.title: Silver Dust
monumenta:handbook/money/sd.description: Special currency given for breaking down Region 3 rare items into their base form in Dungeon Lobbies.

monumenta:handbook/money/soul_thread.title: Soul Thread
monumenta:handbook/money/soul_thread.description: Obtained from slaying enemies around Monumenta. Exchange at a Soul Weaver for supplies!

monumenta:handbook/money/xp.title: Experience Bottle
monumenta:handbook/money/xp.description: XP; The basic currency of King's Valley.

monumenta:handbook/spawners_/alert_spawn.title: Alert Spawners
monumenta:handbook/spawners_/alert_spawn.description: Alert spawners can be identified by the yellow dust particles in the block. On break, they will retarget nearby enemies to you.

monumenta:handbook/spawners_/cat_spawner.title: Cat Spawners
monumenta:handbook/spawners_/cat_spawner.description: Cat spawners cannot be identified on their own. On break, they will spawn a cat that you must kill to actually break the spawner.

monumenta:handbook/spawners_/earthquake_.title: Earthquake Spawners
monumenta:handbook/spawners_/earthquake_.description: Earthquake spawners can be identified by the brown dust particles in the block. On break, they will initiate a set countdown and launch the players in the radius in the air, also dealing damage.

monumenta:handbook/spawners_/ensnared_sp.title: Ensnared Spawners
monumenta:handbook/spawners_/ensnared_sp.description: Ensnared spawners cannot be identified on their own. On break, they form a ring wall that traps players inside until all mobs within the ring are killed.

monumenta:handbook/spawners_/firework_sp.title: Firework Spawners
monumenta:handbook/spawners_/firework_sp.description: Firework spawners can be identified by the smoke particles coming out of the block. On break, they will launch primed tnt upwards from their location.

monumenta:handbook/spawners_/guarded_spa.title: Guarded Spawners
monumenta:handbook/spawners_/guarded_spa.description: Guarded spawners cannot be identified on their own. You cannot break them until all mobs nearby are dead. On break, they'll create a line towards each nearby mob if applicable.

monumenta:handbook/spawners_/healer_spaw.title: Healer Spawners
monumenta:handbook/spawners_/healer_spaw.description: Healer spawners can be identified by the heart that appears out of the block. On break, they will heal nearby enemies.

monumenta:handbook/spawners_/protector_s.title: Protector Spawners
monumenta:handbook/spawners_/protector_s.description: Protector spawners cannot be identified on their own. Mobs spawned by a protector spawner glow light blue and cannot be killed. On break, these mobs become vulnerable.

monumenta:handbook/spawners_/random_spaw.title: Randomized Spawners
monumenta:handbook/spawners_/random_spaw.description: Randomized spawners can be identified by rainbow dust particles on each corner of the block. They will spawn mobs from a pool rather than a single type.

monumenta:handbook/spawners_/revenge_spa.title: Revenge Spawners
monumenta:handbook/spawners_/revenge_spa.description: Revenge spawners can be identified by the red dust particles in the block. On break, they will summon mobs from the same pool as the spawner.

monumenta:handbook/spawners_/root.title: Spawners
monumenta:handbook/spawners_/root.description: Spawner types you may encounter when playing Monumenta.

monumenta:handbook/spawners_/shielded_sp.title: Shielded Spawners
monumenta:handbook/spawners_/shielded_sp.description: Shielded spawners can be identified by their persistent blue ring particles around them. These have to be broken multiple times, depending on the number displayed above them on break.

monumenta:handbook/spawners_/treasure_sp.title: Treasure Spawners
monumenta:handbook/spawners_/treasure_sp.description: Treasure spawners can be identified by their golden ring particles. On break, they will grant 1 treasure score to the party.

monumenta:general/jackpot1.title: Royal Jackpot!
monumenta:general/jackpot1.description: Win the King's Warden in Rock's Little Casino.

monumenta:general/jackpot2.title: Tropical Jackpot!
monumenta:general/jackpot2.description: Win the Frost Giant's Crown in Monarch's Cozy Casino.

monumenta:general/jackpot3.title: Shady Jackpot!
monumenta:general/jackpot3.description: Win the Grand Prize Ticket in the Sticks and Stone Tavern.

monumenta:general/r2transmog1.title: Tropical Transmog I
monumenta:general/r2transmog1.description: Use the Celsian Isles Transmogrifier 20 times.

monumenta:general/r2transmog2.title: Tropical Transmog II
monumenta:general/r2transmog2.description: Use the Celsian Isles Transmogrifier 50 times.

monumenta:general/r2transmog3.title: Tropical Transmog III
monumenta:general/r2transmog3.description: Use the Celsian Isles Transmogrifier 100 times.

monumenta:general/r2transmog4.title: Tropical Transmog IV
monumenta:general/r2transmog4.description: Use the Celsian Isles Transmogrifier 200 times.

monumenta:general/r2transmog5.title: Tropical Transmog V
monumenta:general/r2transmog5.description: Use the Celsian Isles Transmogrifier 500 times.

monumenta:general/r3transmog1.title: Avant-Garde Transmog I
monumenta:general/r3transmog1.description: Use the Architect's Ring Transmogrifier 20 times.

monumenta:general/r3transmog2.title: Avant-Garde Transmog II
monumenta:general/r3transmog2.description: Use the Architect's Ring Transmogrifier 50 times.

monumenta:general/r3transmog3.title: Avant-Garde Transmog III
monumenta:general/r3transmog3.description: Use the Architect's Ring Transmogrifier 100 times.

monumenta:general/r3transmog4.title: Avant-Garde Transmog IV
monumenta:general/r3transmog4.description: Use the Architect's Ring Transmogrifier 200 times.

monumenta:general/r3transmog5.title: Avant-Garde Transmog V
monumenta:general/r3transmog5.description: Use the Architect's Ring Transmogrifier 500 times.

monumenta:trophies/events/2017/roguelike.title: Patron Roguelike Event
monumenta:trophies/events/2017/roguelike.description: Amazing! And to think this was the day you first played it!

monumenta:trophies/events/2018/snowmanfi.title: Winter 2018
monumenta:trophies/events/2018/snowmanfi.description: Won a snowball fight against skilled snowman warriors

monumenta:trophies/events/2018/snowmanso.title: Winter 2018 - Solo PvE
monumenta:trophies/events/2018/snowmanso.description: Won a solo snowball fight against skilled snowman warriors

monumenta:trophies/events/2019/getspleef.title: Get Spleefed
monumenta:trophies/events/2019/getspleef.description: You proved that you aren't quite such a master of the spleefing arts. Winter 2019

monumenta:trophies/events/2019/halloween.title: Creeper's Delight
monumenta:trophies/events/2019/halloween.description: You learnt about trickster creepers from a rather strange man. Halloween 2019

monumenta:trophies/events/2019/snowmanmv.title: Snowman Arena MVP
monumenta:trophies/events/2019/snowmanmv.description: You were the most valuable player in the snowman arena. Winter 2019

monumenta:trophies/events/2019/spleefcha.title: Spleef Champion
monumenta:trophies/events/2019/spleefcha.description: You proved yourself a master of the spleefing arts. Winter 2019

monumenta:trophies/events/2020/cleaning1.title: Spring Cleaning Newbie
monumenta:trophies/events/2020/cleaning1.description: You donated 50 or more points worth of items in the Spring Cleaning event.

monumenta:trophies/events/2020/cleaning2.title: Spring Cleaning Amateur
monumenta:trophies/events/2020/cleaning2.description: You donated 500 or more points worth of items in the Spring Cleaning event.

monumenta:trophies/events/2020/cleaning3.title: Spring Cleaning Expert
monumenta:trophies/events/2020/cleaning3.description: You donated 5000 or more points worth of items in the Spring Cleaning event.

monumenta:trophies/events/2020/halloween.title: Extra Creepy
monumenta:trophies/events/2020/halloween.description: You learnt a bit more about trickster creepers from a rather strange man. Halloween 2020

monumenta:trophies/events/2021/halloween.title: The Creepering
monumenta:trophies/events/2021/halloween.description: You learnt a bit too much about trickster creepers from a rather strange man. Halloween 2021

monumenta:trophies/events/2021/winter.title: Savior of the Holidays
monumenta:trophies/events/2021/winter.description: You defeated the Snow Wool Spirit as soon as it was released, saving the holidays before it was too late!

monumenta:trophies/events/2022/halloween.title: Creeperween: The Creeper Strikes Back
monumenta:trophies/events/2022/halloween.description: We're off with a bang! Halloween 2022

monumenta:trophies/events/2022/snowman2s.title: Winter 2022 - Solo PvE
monumenta:trophies/events/2022/snowman2s.description: Won the Sierhaven Snowball Brawl solo against the frosty snowman armies.

monumenta:trophies/events/2022/winter.title: Let It Snow!
monumenta:trophies/events/2022/winter.description: You experienced a true Sierhaven Christmas, and engaged in a snowball fight!

monumenta:trophies/events/2022/winter2.title: Drift Legend
monumenta:trophies/events/2022/winter2.description: You were recognized as a true master of drifting in a game of Ice Spleef.

monumenta:trophies/events/2023/halloween.title: Creepo-Palooza!
monumenta:trophies/events/2023/halloween.description: You might say this year was a... banger! Halloween 2023

monumenta:trophies/events/2023/winter.title: P-Zero Champion
monumenta:trophies/events/2023/winter.description: You got 1st place in a P-Zero race with at least 4 players.

monumenta:trophies/events/2024/halloween.title: Oh The Creepery
monumenta:trophies/events/2024/halloween.description: The sound of hissing and explosions can be heard throughout Monumenta, as it is that time of year once again... Halloween 2024

monumenta:trophies/events/2024/halloween.title: Anti-Tricky Behavior
monumenta:trophies/events/2024/halloween.description: Nice try! You attempted to feed a Creeper's Delight to Ru'Ten in Hexfall during Creeperween in 2024.

monumenta:trophies/events/2024/snowball_.title: Ice Cold Accuracy
monumenta:trophies/events/2024/snowball_.description: You hit players with snowballs 25 times during the Winter 2024 event.

monumenta:trophies/events/2024/snowball_.title: Permafrost

monumenta:pois/r3/shrines/root.description: Shrines are special locations in the Architect's Ring where you may obtain powerful 4-hour buffs in exchange for overworld materials.  Learn more about it with Cadeus in Galengarde.

monumenta:pois/r3/shrines/sky_seekers_gr.title: Sky Seeker's Grace
monumenta:pois/r3/shrines/sky_seekers_gr.description: Discover the Sky Seeker's Shrine. Effects: After slaying an enemy, if it has not done damage to you, gain 10% speed and 7.5% damage for 4 seconds, otherwise, lose 7.5% damage for 4 seconds. Coordinates: 161 206 817

monumenta:pois/r3/shrines/tuathan_blessi.title: Tuathan Blessing
monumenta:pois/r3/shrines/tuathan_blessi.description: Discover the Tuathan Shrine. Effects: If there are players in a 12 block radius, they gain 5% Damage Resistance and you gain 5% Speed. Coordinates: -321 177 62

monumenta:challenges/discoveries/devoure.title: Devoured, Forgotten
monumenta:challenges/discoveries/devoure.description: Every living being is destined to forget all that it knows. Everything it gains, it will one day lose. The Outsiders are that fact made manifest. Their endless march cuts a scar of silence across reality. The end of each world is the same - no matter which being is judged worthy of bringing it.

monumenta:challenges/discoveries/mage_me.title: Memorandum of the Council
monumenta:challenges/discoveries/mage_me.description: After shattering the protective seal guarding the Mage Memorial, Kaul's blessing has led you to a relic of a recent tragedy.

monumenta:challenges/discoveries/root.title: Legendary Discoveries
monumenta:challenges/discoveries/root.description: The world holds many secrets, some are ancient artifacts told in old tales, others may last unmoved until the end of time. However, these Legendary Discoveries are monuments of your own adventures across the world, telling a tale rivaled by few.

monumenta:challenges/r1/arena/complete.title: Defeat the Arena of Terth
monumenta:challenges/r1/arena/complete.description: The master of the arena has fallen, but Yeigar swears to return...

monumenta:challenges/r1/arena/find.title: Discovered Arena of Terth
monumenta:challenges/r1/arena/find.description: Welcome, challengers and spectators alike, to the Arena of Terth! Town: Sierhaven Coordinates: x=-946 y=107 z=-104

monumenta:challenges/r1/azacor_grove/sol.title: Azacor (Solo)
monumenta:challenges/r1/azacor_grove/sol.description: Defeat Azacor Solo Despite all odds, you managed to take down the Dark Summoner all on your own.

monumenta:challenges/r1/kaul/beat_kaul.title: Kaul

monumenta:dungeons/blue/complete.title: Defeat Blue Dungeon

monumenta:dungeons/blue/find.title: Found Blue Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/blue/find.description: Hidden within a Fortress; hidden within a prison. Hycenea's chains stay bound. POI: Coven Fortress Coordinates: x=-531 y=176 z=-387

monumenta:dungeons/blue/find_quest.title: Wolf in Witch's Clothing
monumenta:dungeons/blue/find_quest.description: With the forces of the Dichen and the Aradia, you raided the Coven's fortress, defeated the Council, and freed Hycenea... before Calder interrupted your victory.

monumenta:dungeons/brown/complete.title: Defeat Brown Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/brown/complete.description: You scrapped with the mechanations below the earth and came out victorious after navigating the Cradle.

monumenta:dungeons/brown/find.title: Found Brown Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/brown/find.description: Mechanical clanking and buzzing noises spew forth from the ground. What lies deep below Pelias' folly? POI: Arx Spirensis Coordinates: x=-485 y=62 z=19

monumenta:dungeons/brown/find_quest.title: Mechs Machina
monumenta:dungeons/brown/find_quest.description: You launched a counter-attack following a warning from the Machine God's Herald, and found yourself at the entrance to The Cradle of the Broken God.

monumenta:dungeons/cyan/complete.description: You fought off an ancient horror and claimed the Cyan Wool.

monumenta:dungeons/cyan/find.title: Found Cyan Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/cyan/find.description: Deep below the ground lies an abandoned mineshaft, stained with secrets long forgotten. For what is a greater folly of man than the sin of greed? POI: Basanite Bore Coordinates: x=41 y=114 z=285

monumenta:dungeons/cyan/find_quest.title: Secrets Best Left Forgotten
monumenta:dungeons/cyan/find_quest.description: In an attempt to uncover the secrets of Molta's past, you unintentionally opened a path to the surface for an evil that had been sealed away.

monumenta:dungeons/depths/complete.title: Defeat Darkest Depths
monumenta:dungeons/depths/complete.description: You fought back against Faimynyw's excursion into our world, and claimed powerful treasures.

monumenta:dungeons/depths/find.title: Found Darkest Depths
monumenta:dungeons/depths/find.description: Far, far below the waves lies a disturbance, a tear into our world. What possibly could have caused this? Location: Breachpoint Coordinates: x=-702 y=9 z=-186

monumenta:dungeons/forum/challenge.title: Bhairavi's Challenge
monumenta:dungeons/forum/challenge.description: You conquered the Fallen Forum dungeon under Challenge Delve conditions!

monumenta:dungeons/forum/find.title: Found The Fallen Forum
monumenta:dungeons/forum/find.description: Having passed through the time itself in the ruins of the Congress, the Fallen Forum awaits. Coordinates: x=-600 y=1 z=525

monumenta:dungeons/forum/find_quest.description: You found what the Teal Spirit was up to in the Ruins of the Congress, destroying a false wool to help free itself years ago. You destroyed the freed spirit, but Teal is still on the run.

monumenta:dungeons/forum/olive.title: Fallen Lore-um
monumenta:dungeons/forum/olive.description: You have scoured every corner of the Fallen Forum and collected yourself a Replica Olive Wool

monumenta:dungeons/fred/battle_tendency.title: Battle Tendency
monumenta:dungeons/fred/battle_tendency.description: You are a true master of the lore. Fred would be proud.

monumenta:dungeons/fred/challenge.title: Fred's Challenge
monumenta:dungeons/fred/challenge.description: You conquered the Shifting City dungeon under Challenge Delve conditions!

monumenta:dungeons/fred/complete.description: You explored the shifting depths of Steelmeld's undercity.

monumenta:dungeons/fred/find.title: Found City of Shifting Waters
monumenta:dungeons/fred/find.description: Deep below Steelmeld, sealed away by its unknown former inhabitants, lies secrets long since forgotten. POI: Steelmeld Passage Coordinates: x=-433 y=14 z=-495

monumenta:dungeons/fred/find_quest.description: You assisted Fred on his journey to unlock a strange passage way leading deep below Steelmeld.

monumenta:dungeons/fred/find_quest2.title: The Stone Ocean
monumenta:dungeons/fred/find_quest2.description: You assisted Fred with more research and ended up disturbing the city even further, bringing forth more dangerous rooms.

monumenta:dungeons/gray/cake.title: Cake?
monumenta:dungeons/gray/cake.description: You discovered the true treasure within the Valley of Forgotten Pharaohs.

monumenta:dungeons/gray/challenge.description: You conquered the Gray Wool dungeon under Challenge Delve conditions!

monumenta:dungeons/gray/find.title: Found Gray Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/gray/find.description: What would force a kingdom to lock off their capital? Al Malakut awaits its rediscovery. POI: Lost Sands City Coordinates: x=239 y=66 z=394

monumenta:dungeons/gray/find_quest.title: The Gem of Ishnir
monumenta:dungeons/gray/find_quest.description: You discoved the tomb of Tehkma Ka and found the lost city of Al Malakut.

monumenta:dungeons/hexfall/cage_match.title: Cage Match

monumenta:dungeons/hexfall/complete_hyce.title: Defeated Hycenea

monumenta:dungeons/hexfall/hycenea_maste.description: You have perfected the strike against Hycenea!

monumenta:dungeons/hexfall/rebirth.title: Rebirth
monumenta:dungeons/hexfall/rebirth.description: Something stirs beneath the Sanctum, but it seems to be quelled... for now...

monumenta:dungeons/hexfall/ruten_master.title: Ru'Ten Master
monumenta:dungeons/hexfall/ruten_master.description: You have perfected the strike against Ru'Ten!

monumenta:dungeons/labs/find_quest.description: You volunteered to take on bandits threatening to destroy the capital's Alchemy Labs.

monumenta:dungeons/orange/exalted.description: You conquered the Orange Wool dungeon's Exalted mode!

monumenta:dungeons/orange/find.description: You discovered a lost outpost of the Tlaxans, hiding more than just loot... POI: Abandoned Tunnels Coordinates: x=109 y=79 z=143

monumenta:dungeons/orange/find_quest.description: You made your way through C'Zanil's crypt and found a way inside a dungeon.

monumenta:dungeons/pink/rootstrike.description: You created Rootstrike, the sword of nobles.

monumenta:dungeons/purple/challenge.title: Varcosa's Challenge

monumenta:dungeons/purple/find_quest.description: Seeking out the final fate of Salazar the Great, you discovered the mythical island of Corsair's Claw.

monumenta:dungeons/r1bonus/find_quest2.title: The Staff?

monumenta:dungeons/reverie/challenge.title: Kaul's Challenge

monumenta:dungeons/reverie/complete.title: Defeat Malevolent Reverie
monumenta:dungeons/reverie/complete.description: You defeated Kaul, saved the Narsens, and left victorious.

monumenta:dungeons/reverie/exalted.title: Exalted Malevolent Reverie
monumenta:dungeons/reverie/exalted.description: You conquered the Malevolent Reverie's Exalted mode!

monumenta:dungeons/reverie/find.description: One man's dream is the Narsens' nightmare. POI: Verdant Fortress? Coordinates: x=916 y=106 z=182

monumenta:dungeons/roguelike/completecla.description: You discovered yet another of the many treasures of the Ephemeral Corridors, but could more remain hidden in its depths still?

monumenta:dungeons/roguelike/completehar.description: You discovered another one of the many treasures of the Ephemeral Corridors, but still more remain hidden in its depths.

monumenta:dungeons/roguelike/find.description: You find a maze of twisty little passages, all alike. POI: Anthill Coordinates: x=819 y=110 z=209

monumenta:dungeons/roguelike/secret.description: You used Virius' machine to stitch together a sharded memory. Whose could it be of, though?

monumenta:dungeons/root_r1.title: King's Valley Dungeons
monumenta:dungeons/root_r1.description: Dungeons you will find throughout the King's Valley region.

monumenta:dungeons/root_r2.description: Dungeons you will find throughout the Celsian Isles region.

monumenta:dungeons/root_r3.description: Dungeons you will find throughout the Architect's Ring region.

monumenta:dungeons/skt/complete.title: Defeated SKT (Story Mode)
monumenta:dungeons/skt/complete.description: You battled through the reawakened defenses of Isharist and recontained the Teal Wool Spirit.

monumenta:dungeons/skt/complete_normal.description: You battled through the reawakened defenses of Isharist and recontained the Teal Wool Spirit.

monumenta:dungeons/skt/complete_savage.title: Defeated SKT (Savage Mode)
monumenta:dungeons/skt/complete_savage.description: You battled through the reawakened defenses of Isharist and recontained the Teal Wool Spirit.

monumenta:dungeons/skt/find.title: Found the Silver Knight's Tomb
monumenta:dungeons/skt/find.description: Before you stands a gate, leading deep into the surviving ruins of Isharist. The Teal Spirit waits within... Coordinates: x=-1530 y=9 z=1702

monumenta:dungeons/skt/find_quest.title: The Tomb of Time
monumenta:dungeons/skt/find_quest.description: You followed the Teal Wool Spirit into the depths of the earth and recontained it inside the ruins of Isharist... and found a new region.

monumenta:dungeons/skt/secret.title: Shifting Realities
monumenta:dungeons/skt/secret.description: You unlocked the memories that fade through the threads of reality.

monumenta:dungeons/teal/challenge.title: Max's Challenge
monumenta:dungeons/teal/challenge.description: You conquered the Teal Wool dungeon under Challenge Delve conditions!

monumenta:dungeons/teal/complete.title: Defeat Echoes of Oblivion
monumenta:dungeons/teal/complete.description: After defying the laws of time itself, you witnessed a Wool disappear from this world.

monumenta:dungeons/teal/find.title: Found Echoes of Oblivion
monumenta:dungeons/teal/find.description: Having passed through the Sacrarium of Aeons, a strange place lost to time now sits before you. POI: Sacrarium of Aeons Coordinates: x=-860 y=32 z=-450

monumenta:dungeons/teal/find_quest.title: Unmasked
monumenta:dungeons/teal/find_quest.description: After traveling through the lost empire of Isharist, the man you traveled with, Max, held a dark secret.

monumenta:dungeons/teal/hour.title: Man of the Hour
monumenta:dungeons/teal/hour.description: You collected all Time Crystals without falling into the void once. Wonderful job!

monumenta:dungeons/white/challenge.title: Quetzalcoatl's Challenge
monumenta:dungeons/white/challenge.description: You conquered the White Wool dungeon under Challenge Delve conditions!

monumenta:dungeons/white/complete.title: Defeat White Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/white/complete.description: You defeated the guardians of Quetzalcoatl, claiming the White Wool.

monumenta:dungeons/white/exalted.title: Exalted White Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/white/exalted.description: You conquered the White Wool dungeon's Exalted mode!

monumenta:dungeons/white/find.title: Found White Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/white/find.description: Before you lies the ancient sacrificial temple to a lost god... POI: Tlaxan Ziggurat Coordinates: x=215 y=125 z=-109

monumenta:dungeons/white/find_quest.title: Winds of War
monumenta:dungeons/white/find_quest.description: You broke a powerful curse over the Blackroot Battlefield and found a way inside a dungeon.

monumenta:dungeons/yellow/challenge.title: Deva's Challenge
monumenta:dungeons/yellow/challenge.description: You conquered the Yellow Wool dungeon under Challenge Delve conditions!

monumenta:dungeons/yellow/complete.description: The seasons overcome, now Kaul's power is released, but the Yellow Wool is now yours.

monumenta:dungeons/yellow/exalted.title: Exalted Yellow Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/yellow/exalted.description: You conquered the Yellow Wool dungeon's Exalted mode!

monumenta:dungeons/yellow/find.title: Found Yellow Dungeon
monumenta:dungeons/yellow/find.description: The seasons rage before you, a curse on the Sons of the Forest. Can you overcome them? POI: Cursed Forest Coordinates: x=1100 y=104 z=60

monumenta:dungeons/yellow/find_quest.description: You reclaimed the ancient relic from the Sons of the Forest and have given Highwatch an opportunity to attack Verdant Fortress.
